main event: A fiery red object with a fiery tail, about 30 ft in size, was observed traveling at high speed and very high altitude over Lake City, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was described as having a fiery red color and a fiery tail.
The object was traveling at a terrific speed and very high altitude.
The observation lasted for a few seconds.
The observer was a retired miner from Lake City, Tennessee.
No photographs were taken of the sighting.
sighted object: a fiery red object with a fiery tail
